messages.subject: Just say NO
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/3/02 5:15:33 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/3/02 5:15:33 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Don't you realize that when children have been on medication, that they
cannot
go COLD TURKEY??? >>

You can with Ritalin.
In fact, many, many parents are advised to only give it to them during the
school week and leave them off it on the weekends. Seems like a big HUGE,
in-your-face way of saying they only need to be drugged to keep them zombies
while in school.
There's no problem stopping Ritalin cold turkey that I've ever heard.
Ren
